netZero.title: Net-Zero
netZero.subtitle: 2024 Ambition
netZero.text: The transition to a sustainable future requires industries and institutions to make a firm commitment to achieve carbon neutrality, known as Net Zero. This goal is essential to mitigate climate change and ensure the preservation of our planet for future generations.
netZero.subtext: To achieve this goal, it is necessary to adopt a comprehensive approach, considering the three emission scopes defined by the Greenhouse Gas Protocol (GHG).
netZero.escopo1: Refers to direct emissions from industry's own activities.
netZero.escopo2: Covers emissions associated with acquired electricity.
netZero.escopo3: Includes indirect emissions from supply chain activities and product use.
netZero.escopo4: Polo Brasil Zero has been designed to meet all scopes, enabling a Zero Liquid Emissions industrial protocol from 2024.
netZero.projection: Projection of GHG emissions in the atmosphere - Americas
